name: Sniper Street City Muti
description:
Sniper Street City Muti is an Ultimate first person action shooter game. Use your sniper gun as a battlefield hero sniper to kill your dangerous enemies in this sniper game to become a sniper commando hunter. Show your superb combat skills to experience real shooting as an elite sniper in the challenging FPS game.
Features :

- Great gameplay with multi and entertaining missions.
- Ultra 3D, HD graphics with cool animations
- Plenty of thrilling missions
- Modern Guns and mortal Weapons
- Incredible FPS game play
- Smooth and advance controls with advance radar system
